preclusion: YSC2207 Techniques in Analytical Chemistry and YSC2208 Techniques in Organic Chemistry (previous module codes)
description: This course is an introduction to the laboratory techniques in analytical and organic chemistry with an emphasis on the fundamental principles and utilisation of state‐of‐the‐art instruments.
title: Instrumental Analysis with Laboratory
prerequisite: YSC1207 General Chemistry or YSC1213 General Physics (may be fulfilled as a co-requisite)
